review_text: This is a great bank. I opened a new account on Mill Plain road with Sherrill Koch, the Branch Relationship Manager.  I really enjoyed our conversation,  as it didn't feel stuffy like most other banks.  She gave me a lot of knowledge of the bank.  I grew up here in Danbury, Connecticut and never realized that Savings Bank of Danbury has been open for a 170 years....wow!  Also having attended Danbury High School, I had the opportunity to meet Mr. Hal Wibling's daughters.   He is the Chairman of this establishment, and the family integrity is well represented by they banking institution.
Great people and excellent bank overall. Reccomend highly
Fantastic service and helpful, friendly staff.
